name: Poke Burritos
description: Indulge in the delightful flavors of fresh poke wrapped in a warm tortilla with a medley of ingredients, offering a burst of taste in every bite.

name: Carne Asada Tacos
description: Savor the bold and savory taste of carne asada, perfectly seasoned and served in soft tacos for a satisfying and flavorful experience.

name: Sweet Potato Burritos
description: Experience the perfect blend of sweet and savory with sweet potato burritos, filled with lentils, kale, and a delightful combination of ingredients.

name: Cauliflower Quinoa
description: Delight in the crispy goodness of cauliflower combined with nutritious quinoa, served in tacos for a satisfying and wholesome meal.

name: Carne Asada Burrito
description: Savor the bold flavors of carne asada combined with rice, beans, and your choice of toppings in this delicious and hearty burrito.

name: Chicken Burrito
description: Enjoy the mouthwatering combination of seasoned chicken, rice, beans, and flavorful toppings in this classic and satisfying burrito.

name: California Club Wrap
description: Experience the California vibes with this burrito featuring fresh ingredients and a touch of West Coast flavor, served in a delightful wrap.

name: Black Bean
description: Delight in the simplicity of a black bean burrito, featuring a classic blend of beans and melted cheese wrapped in a warm tortilla.

name: Vegetable Burrito
description: Savor the goodness of roasted spring vegetables wrapped in a warm tortilla, offering a burst of flavors in every bite.

name: Butternut Burrito
description: Treat yourself to the Butternut Burrito, filled with a medley of delicious ingredients, including butternut squash, for a satisfying and flavorful meal.
